panels.content:
This section of the dashboard shows a green/yellow/red status for 95th percentile response latency for various services.
#### What do these measures convey?
These graphs track the 95th percentile response latency.  What this means is that "95% of the time, a request to this service took this many milliseconds or less."  95th percentile is a more accurate measurement when you are trying to see aberrations in performance.  If you were to graph an average, the spikes would be lost in the average, but p95 will show those spikes plainly.
panels.title: 95th Percentile Latency
Summed operations/sec, all mongo nodes in $environment
Total document operations/sec, all mongo instances in $environment
